name: "BY FIRE BE PURGED"
effect: Choose two: Destroy all opposing abilities; destroy all opposing allies; or destroy all opposing equipment.
Nowhere in the Firelord's lair is safe from the flames.

name: "DIE, INSECT!"
effect:
Ongoing: When an opposing ally is destroyed, draw a card.
When an opposing hero is destroyed, draw a card for each rune you have.

name: "NOW FOR YOU, INSECTS!"
effect: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
"BOLDLY, YOU SOUGHT THE POWER OF RAGNAROS. NOW YOU SHALL SEE IT FIRSTHAND!"

name: Ancient Core Hound
effect:
When Ancient Core Hound enters play, roll a die.
1-2: Exhaust all opposing allies.
3-4: Ancient Core Hound deals 2 fire damage to each ally in a party of your choice.
5-6: Put an opposing ally into ist owner's hand.
These great beasts of lava roam the whole of the Molten Core.

name: Ashes to Ashes
effect:
Each opponent chooses an ally in his party and removes it from the game. If your hero is Majordomo Executus, you choose instead.
Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed, remove it from the game.
"You think you've won already? Perhaps you'll need another lesson in pain!"

name: Baron Geddon
effect:
FRONT: When Baron Geddon enters play, each opponent destroys all but five of his resources.
At the end of your turn, Baron Geddon deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally for each resource you have.
[Activate] ==> Flip Baron Geddon.
BACK: Destroy Baron Geddon ==> Baron Geddon deals 12 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. Use only if Baron Geddon has 12 or more damage.

name: Core Rager
effect:
Protector
At the end of your turn, ready Core Rager.

name: Elemental Fire
effect: When a hero or ally deals damage to Ragnaros this turn, Ragnaros deals that much fire damage to each hero and ally in that character's party.

name: Firelord
effect: When Firelord enters play, put a Lava Spawn into play.
The first thing eager raiders learn about the Molten Core is the importance of keeping lava spawns under control.

name: Firesworn
effect: When Firesworn is dealt fatal damage, it deals 1 fire damage to the source of that damage.

name: Flame Burst
effect: Each opponent destroys one of his resources.
In the depth of the Molten Core, you're well advised to watch your step.

name: Flame Imps
effect: Seemingly endless packs of flame imps lie in wait for those who seek to venture into Magmadar Cavern.

name: Flames of Sulfuron
effect: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each rune you have.
"TASTE THE FLAMES OF SULFURON!"

name: Flames of the Incinerator
effect:
Attach to target opposing hero or ally, and your hero deals 3 fire damage to it.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character, or 4 damage if your hero is Golemagg.

name: Flamewalker
effect: 1, Destroy Flamewalker ==> Destroy target equipment.

name: Flamewalker Elite
effect: Protector

name: Flamewalker Healer
effect: [Activate] ==> Flamewalker Healer deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party.

name: Flamewalker Priest
effect: [Activate] ==> Flamewalker Priest heals 4 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Flamewalker Protector
effect: [Activate] ==> Exhaust target ready ally. That ally deals melee damage equal to ist ATK to ist controller's hero. Use only on your turn.

name: Flaming Assault
effect: Ready Ragnaros.

name: Fury of the Firelord
effect:
Ragnaros deals 50 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. That damage can't be prevented.
Fury of the Firelord can't be interrupted.
When Emperor Thaurissan called upon a powerful elemental to aid him in the War of the Three Hammers, he knew not what power he would awaken.

name: Garr
effect:
FRONT: Garr has +3 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the end of each turn, if you have four or fewer Firesworn, flip Garr.
BACK: Garr has +6 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
1 ==> Destroy one of your Firesworn. If you do, it deals 2 fire damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party.

name: Gehennas
effect:
FRONT: Gehennas has +2 ATK while attacking and can only attack heroes.
At the end of your turn, Gehennas deals 3 shadow damage to target opposing hero chosen at random. That hero's controller discards a card. Flip Gehennas.
BACK: Gehennas has +2 ATK while attacking and can only attack heroes.
At the end of your turn, Gehennas deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally. Flip Gehennas.

name: Gehennas's Shadowbolt
effect: Your hero deals 4 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally. If your hero is Gehennas, each opponent discards a card.

name: Golemagg the Incinerator
effect:
FRONT: Golemagg has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the end of your turn, Golemagg deals 3 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally.
At the start of your turn, if Golemagg has 15 or more damage, flip him.
BACK: Golemagg has +5 while attacking and can attack only heroes.
When Golemagg is dealt damage, he deals 5 melee damage to the source of that damage.

name: Hammer of Ragnaros
effect: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment. Its controller destroys another one of his abilities, allies, or equipment.
The mighty hammer came down with such force that nothing could have survived.

name: Hotter Than Goo
effect: Destroy all of target opponent's abilities, allies, and equipment.
"Even the steaming goo that flows in Hive'Ashi won't melt thorium. I'm getting out of here!" - Savin Lightguard

name: Inspire
effect:
You may flip your hero.
If your hero is Sulfuron Harbinger, you may ready him.

name: Lava Annihilator
effect: When Lava Annihilator enters play, you may destroy target ally.
"They don't respond well to taunts. Believe me, I've tried." - Victoria Jaton

name: Lava Pack
effect: When Lava Pack enters play, put the top card of the Minion deck into play as an ally.
"The only thing worse than a ball of living flame is four of them." - Grumpherys

name: Lava Pool
effect: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.
Someone always falls into the lava.

name: Lava Spawn
effect: At the start of your turn, put a Lava Spawn into play.

name: Lava Spit
effect: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target opposing ally. If your hero is Magmadar, he also deals 2 fire damage to each other hero and ally in that ally's party.
When a dog drools molten rock, slobbering is deadly.

name: Lava Splash
effect: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in target player's party for each rune you have.

name: Lava Surger
effect: When Lava Surger deals combat damage to a hero, ready Lava Surger. It can't attack that hero this turn.
These elementals surge about randomly, knocking around those unfortunate enough to stand in their path.

name: Living Bomb
effect:
Attach to target opposing ally.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy attached ally. If your hero is Baron Geddon, that ally deals fire damage equal to ist cost to each other hero and ally in ist party.
"RUN!"

name: Lucifron
effect:
FRONT: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the start of your third turn, flip Lucifron.
BACK: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the end of your turn, Lucifron deals 6 shadow damage to each opposing hero.

name: Lucifron's Curse
effect: Choose one: Destroy target ability; or interrupt target ability card. If your hero is Lucifron, you may choose both.
The curse so sapped his strength that it took all of his will just to swing his sword.

name: Magma Blast
effect: Ongoing: At the end of each opponent's turn, if Ragnaros isn't Submerged and was dealt no damage this turn, Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to that player's hero for each rune you have.

name: Magma Shackles
effect:
Attach to target ally and exhaust it.
Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step. While your hero is Garr, each ally in that ally's party can't ready during its controller's ready step.

name: Magmadar
effect:
FRONT: Magmadar has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
At the end of your turn, flip Magmadar.
BACK: Magmadar has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
1, Exhaust a Hunter in your party ==> Flip Magmadar. Any player may use this power during that player's turn.

name: Majordomo Executus
effect:
FRONT: At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If it's heads, prevent all damage that would be dealt by opposing allies until your next turn. If it's tails, destroy all abilities attached to your allies and prevent all damage that would be dealt with opposing abilities until your next turn.
At the end of each turn, if you have no allies, flip Majordomo Executus.
BACK: When Majordomo Executus flips to this side, say, "Behold Ragnaros-the Firelord! He who was ancient when this world was young! Bow before him, mortals! Bow before your ending!" Ragnaros awakens.

name: Melt Weapon
effect: Destroy all of target opponent's equipment.
Playing with fire has a price.

name: Molten Destroyer
effect: Molten Destroyer has +1 ATK and +1 health for each rune you have.
Molten destroyers are the stronger, tougher brethren of the molten giants. They stand guard deeper in the Molten Core.

name: Molten Giants
effect: Molten Giants has +1 ATK and +1 health for each rune you have.
These massive creatures are the first sight greeting those who find their way from Blackrock Depths into the Molten Core.

name: Ragnaros
effect:
FRONT: Untargetable
Ragnaros can't be dealt damage. You can't play or discard cards.
At the start of your turn, flip Ragnaros.
BACK: Ragnaros has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
Ragnaros can't be dealt fire damage. At the end of your turn, if you have exactly three resources, put eight Sons of Flame into play and flip Ragnaros.

name: Rune of Blaz
effect: At the end of your turn, destroy all opposing abilities.

name: Rune of Koro
effect: Opposing allies have -2 ATK.

name: Rune of Kress
effect:
At the end of your turn, roll a die.
1: Nothing happens.
2-3: Magmadar deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in a party of your choice.
4-5: Magmadar deals 3 fire damage to an opposing hero or ally.
6: Each opponent puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.

name: Rune of Mazj
effect: When an opponent plays an ability card, interrupt it.

name: Rune of Mohn
effect: Opposing heroes and allies can't be healed.

name: Rune of Their
effect:
Your Core Ragers can't be destroyed or otherwise leave your control while your hero is Golemagg.
When Golemagg is destroyed, remove all of your Core Ragers from the game.

name: Rune of Zeth
effect:
At the start of your turn, if a hero is The Bomb, Baron Geddon deals 5 fire damage to that hero and each ally in its party.
At the end of your turn, choose an opposing hero to be The Bomb until the ned of your next turn.

name: Shazzrah
effect:
FRONT: Shazzrah has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
1 ==> Flip Shazzrah. Use only once per turn.
BACK: When Shazzrah flips to this side, drop him from at least three feet above play. He deals 5 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally he lands on.
At the start of your turn, flip Shazzrah.

name: Shazzrah's Arcane Explosion
effect: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party. If your hero is Shazzrah, draw three cards.

name: Son of Flame
effect:
Ferocity
Son of Flame can't be dealt fire damage. When the last Son of Flame leaves play, if Ragnaros is Submerged, flip Ragnaros.

name: Sulfuron Harbinger
effect:
FRONT: Sulfuron Harbinger has +4 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.
[Activate] ==> Flip Sulfuron Harbinger. Use only on your turn.
BACK: Sulfuron Harbinger has +8 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.

name: Tight Quarters
effect: Destroy target equipment.
"Hold on to your weapons tightly! If you drop something, we're not going looking for it."

name: Unexpected Distraction
effect: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
"I told you to move out of the imp cave!"

name: Unstoppable Flame
effect: This turn, Ragnaros has +X ATK, is untargetable, and can't be protected against.

name: Volcanic Lair
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have five or more resources, destroy target opposing hero.
Even the hardiest of adventurers can only spend so long in the fiery bowels of Blackrock Mountain.

name: Wrath of Ragnaros
effect: Destroy target ally. Ragnaros deals fire damage equal to that ally's cost to a hero in that ally's party.
